tool_description: Routes and driving directions based on OpenStreetMap data
name: Car routes and directions (Google Maps Alternative)
title: Car routes and directions (Google Maps Alternative)
tool_name: Car routes and directions (Google Maps Alternative)

api_list.name: GetRoute
api_list.description: Get a basic route between two points for a car. Returned response is in GeoJSON format. This method does not accept any request body or parameters other than start coordinate and end coordinate.

required_parameters.name: end
required_parameters.description: End point of route. Comma-separated longitude and latitude.

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: Start point of route. Comma-separated longitude and latitude.
